content.raw:
Thanks for the extra checks, the DepthTest wasn't always being run.

I merged in your branch and added a couple of checks f57f94b. It still fails at times, especially when running all tests in a row. More specifically, the second `ASSERT_EQ(this->contactsMsg.contact().size(), 20);` fails sometimes, which means the message is changing before we check all the values.
content.html:
Thanks for the extra checks, the DepthTest wasn't always being run.

I merged in your branch and added a couple of checks f57f94b. It still fails at times, especially when running all tests in a row. More specifically, the second ASSERT_EQ(this->contactsMsg.contact().size(), 20); fails sometimes, which means the message is changing before we check all the values.
